div.p: President of the Ins. Company of North America

We have just received a Notice from the Bank of Pennsa. for 1001 50/100 Doll. which we presume must be for a note given to your office - as we have no memorandum of it with us, not having our Note Book at hand- As our A P expects to be at Germantown on Saturday or Monday we must beg the favor of you to withdraw it from the Bank & accomodate us with a removal of it fro the present as it will not be in our power at so short a notice to meet the payment at this juncture
